name: SUPER SUGAR MYSTERY JAIL
description:
SUPER SUGAR MYSTERY JAIL is a light-hearted graphic adventure game that takes place in a desert prison whose denizens happen to have sugar skulls for heads. Oh, and the prison is haunted.

FEATURES
  • Make the most of your prison sentence! Befriend killers, creeps, nerds, and prison guards. Or be a loner. It's your choice!
  • Find unique items to solve (or create) problems! It is a graphic adventure game, isn't it?
  • Solve the mystery of Sugar Jail! There's something strange going on at night in Sugar Jail...can you crack the case?
  • Multiple levels of floor-sweeping action! That's pretty much what it sounds like. You get to sweep some floors.
  • Play it again and again! Multiple endings depending upon who you align with and what you accomplish while in Sugar Jail.
CREDIT

Game design by Alex Clauss ( pomerane)

Music by sleepytimejesse
